4. Council meeting agendas and minutes

Council meeting agendas and minutes
===================================

Meetings are arranged by meeting type and date, with the most recent at the top of the list. Click Agenda, Agenda Packet, or Minutes to view the documents. Older meeting agendas and minutes can be found [here](http://docs.marysvillewa.gov/HTCOMNET/Default.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fhtcomnet).

Marysville Fire District Board of Directors meeting agendas and minutes can be found on the Fire District's website [here](https://www.marysvillefiredistrict.org/public-information/board-meetings/).

### Contact Us

1. Marysville City Hall
2. 501 Delta Avenue
3. Marysville, WA 98270
4. Phone: [360-363-8000](tel:3603638000)
5. Fax: [360-651-5033](tel:3606515033)

2. Hours:
3. Open Monday through Friday
4. 8 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.
